title: Google play services causing high battery drain - pixel 3 xl
content:
Hi,

My pixel 3 xl had exception poor battery performance. I barely get over 3 -4 hours screen time.
I was looking at battery useage and Google play services is using a large amount of battery. Around 20% in 15 hour period..i have 3 Google accounts but have turned off syncing for most services apart from my main account..

Are there any other suggestions on how I can improve battery performance
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
